thread.title: Peter Stratton
thread.title_full: Euroflorist Sverige recenserad av Peter Stratton

author: Peter Stratton
title: Peter Stratton
text: Further to my last post, the phones are back on again this morning, but I have just spent the last 30 minutes, calling from the UK, constantly being told the whole time I am "number 1 in the queue". Still no reply to my emails. This is Customer Dis-service!! When is someone going to respond to me? Please don't come on here and ask me to call or mail your customer service department, as it means nothing. Total refund please. Nothing else will suffice.
